item.title: Trump launches large-scale strikes on Yemen's Houthis, at least 31 killed
item.description: At least 31 people were killed at the start of a campaign expected to last many days.

item.title: Trump launches large-scale strikes on Yemen's Houthis, at least 19 killed
item.description: At least 19 were killed as U.S. President Donald Trump launched large-scale military strikes against Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis on Saturday.

item.title: Trump invokes 18th-century Aliens Enemies Act to speed deportations, judge stalls it hours later
item.description: A federal judge on Saturday barred the Trump administration from deportations under an 18th-century law that the president invoked just hours earlier.

item.title: Voice of America staff put on leave after Trump orders cuts
item.description: Employees at Voice of America were placed on paid leave, one day after Trump signed an executive order gutting the government-funded media outlets' pa...
